rules_text:
Choose up to one for each color among black, red, and green among permanents you control.
• Put up to two target nonland cards from graveyards on top of their owners' libraries in any order.
• Exile the top two cards of target player's library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards.
• Target player creates two tapped Treasure tokens.
Exile Vishanki Agenda.
